name: dashboard
description: The embedded dashboard for Nakama server.

scripts.start: mkdir -p dist/{css,fonts}; cp ./node_modules/blaze/dist/{blaze.min.css,blaze.colors.min.css} dist/css; cp ./node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css dist/css; cp ./node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* dist/fonts; bundle src/index.js --output dist/app.js --watch
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/{css,fonts}; cp ./node_modules/blaze/dist/{blaze.min.css,blaze.colors.min.css} dist/css; cp ./node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css dist/css; cp ./node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* dist/fonts; bundle src/index.js --output dist/app.js

author: Heroic Labs <team@heroiclabs.com>
